meanings.sent1: Many mispronunciations were heard during the spelling bee.
meanings.sent2: The teacher corrected the mispronunciations of the students.
meanings.sent3: The mispronunciations in the play added a comedic touch to the scene.
meanings.sent4: Her mispronunciations were like a jumbled puzzle to the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The mispronunciations echoed in the classroom, causing laughter.

meanings.definition: The act of pronouncing a word incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The mispronunciations in the speech were noticeable.
meanings.sent2: He made several mispronunciations while reading aloud.
meanings.sent3: The mispronunciations at the party made everyone chuckle.
meanings.sent4: His mispronunciations were like a stumbling block in his presentation.
meanings.sent5: The mispronunciations lingered in the air, creating confusion.
